Package doodlepad

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • doodlepad.Sound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.sound.sampled.LineListener

    public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sound.sampled.LineListener
    A class that loads a supported sound file and allows it to be played. Multiple sound file formats are supported, including WAV.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark F. Russo, Ph.D.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  Sound.SoundEventHandler
      Interface used by methods that assign Sound event handlers given a method reference as a parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open​(java.lang.String path)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                 javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException,
                 javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Open an audio file and create a sound clip ready to be played
        Parameters:
        path - Full path to a sound file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a problem occurs while opening sound file
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when sound file path does not exist
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - when a sound file of unknown format is attempted to be opened
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - when the sound is not able to be played
